overallSummary: Fabio Giglietto maintains a robust social media presence across multiple platforms, including Mastodon, LinkedIn, and Bluesky, with a total follower count of 3,580. His engagement tends to be higher on platforms where professional and academic networks are predominant, reflecting his work in computational social science and disinformation studies.
